data.long_description: The name for madras comes from the Indian city of Madraspatnam (now known as Chennai), home to some of the best of the classic cloth since the 17th century. For these shirts, we went to the country that invented the comfortable, extra-light fabric to create one-of-a-kind patterns you won't find anywhere else.
data.name: Indian madras shirt in cotton
